data.title: Who is Wheeler Dealers’ Ant Anstead and where is he now?
data.meta_description: ANT Anstead has turned his love of motors into a full-time career.But who is he, where is he now and what is his net worth? From his car-focused caree
data.text:
ANT Anstead has turned his love of motors into a full-time career.

But who is he, where is he now and what is his net worth? From his car-focused career to his fortune - here's what you need to know about the television presenter and motor specialist.

Who is Wheeler Dealers’ Ant Anstead?

Ant Anstead was born in Plymouth, Devon, in March 1979.

He is an English television presenter, motor specialist, car builder, designer, and artist.

Prior to following his automotive dreams, Anstead joined the police force in 1999, aged 18.

In 2003, he was appointed one of the youngest Tactical Firearms Team officers in UK history, receiving two commendations for acts of bravery.

Following this, Anstead resigned from the police to pursue a career as a car builder, at the same time forging a successful television career.

As a presenter, the car expert is best known for co-presenting the Channel 4 automotive show For the Love of Cars - a role he first took on in 2014.

Off screen, Anstead has accomplished various notable achievements including nine World Records for car builds.

He also built the world’s largest Airfix auto model, which was featured in a 2011 Ripley’s Believe it or Not book.

Where is Ant Anstead now?

According to his official website, Anstead now resides in the US.

In September 2023, the star revealed details about a new TV show which will document Radford’s stunning Pikes Peak win.

During an interview with Express.co.uk, Anstead admitted a camera team had captured the epic mountain climb with the show expected to air in 2024.

Away from his TV ventures, Anstead is in a relationship with Bridget Jones star Renee Zellweger.

In July 2023, it was reported that the Hollywood actress told close pals that she and Ant were tying the knot following a low-key engagement.

A friend said: “Renee and Ant are keeping their plans incredibly private, they’re not planning a big public announcement.

“She has been telling her inner circle about organising their nuptials, everything will be very low-key.

“Her relationship with Ant is super strong and they’re madly in love, and they can’t wait to get hitched.”

Renee and TV presenter Ant, who has been wed twice before and is a dad of three, began dating in September 2021.

What is Ant Anstead's net worth?

According to wealth website Celebrity Net Worth, Anstead has an estimated net worth of $5 million (£3,957,650.00).

This sum is thanks to his success as a presenter, which has resulted in him becoming a household name among car enthusiasts.

What other shows has Ant Anstead presented?

Aside from his role as a co-presenter on For the Love of Cars, Ant has also starred on a number of popular programmes - one of which was Wheeler Dealers.

In 2017, Anstead replaced Edd China as co-host on Wheeler Dealers and became the new master mechanic alongside trader Mike Brewer in the Discovery Channel restoration show.

"I keep asking 'what is the catch?' I get paid to work on cars. It's an incredible privilege to do what you love."

Ant Anstead

At the time of landing the role, the presenter said: "I've always had a car project on the go - so if you can make your hobby a job you've cracked it.

"I keep asking 'what is the catch?' I get paid to work on cars. It's an incredible privilege to do what you love."

Aside from Wheeler Dealers, Anstead has also presented a number of other shows including, World's Most Expensive Cars, Ant Anstead Master Mechanic, Sky's World's Greatest Cars and Discovery's Celebrity IOU: Joyride.

Other titles he has presented include, Christina on the Coast, Britain's Greatest Invention, The Lost Lotus: Restoring a Race Car, Barrett-Jackson Live Auto Auction and Building Cars Live.
